column1: Originally written in Portuguese by the Brazilian writer Paulo Coelho
column2: “ The Alchemist” is an allegorical novel

column1: about an Andalusian young shepherd who gets a dream that there is treasure in the pyramids of Egypt waiting for him.
In his journey to find the treasure
column2: he meets several people; one who buys his sheep

column1: is looking for an alchemist and also Fatima with whom he falls in love. It is his learning of the real treasure that
makes this novel stand apart from other treasure-finding novels. Be sure to read it because I don’t want to spoil your
fun by telling you about the ending. It is a short read so you can download the PDF version. But I would recommend the
paperback version because the novel can be re-read and is worthy of your book shelf.
